title: Shop error when entering free dreadknight Garen code
body:
Hi,
As i described in the title, I am getting the following shop error message when trying to enter the free 
EUW Dreadknight Garen code:  'There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again'.

Could you please help me with this error?

Thanks

replies.body: Yeah, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll look into this for you and see about unlocking it on your account.  See you there!

same problem as my friend from above
i need help if you like
